patthana8.14:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:1.1_1: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:1.1_2: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:2.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.14:3.1_0: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:3.1_1: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:3.1_2: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
